nodes.text: Elin Roe was a Colonies planet in the Elin Roe system, which was patrolled by Hallyn Phlynne during the Galactic Civil War. It had at least five moons, the fifth of which was bombarded with radioactive dust when the Krish mechanic Maniac tinkered with the drive systems of the Yagaran Four's freighter; when it attempted to enter hyperspace, the drive exploded, destroying the ship.
Cracken's Rebel Operatives originally placed this planet in the Outer Rim Territories, however The Essential Atlas now places it in the Colonies.
